players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. We need to vote to arrest him now before he kills again."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this moment, but I agree that we need to be vigilant and work together to identify the mafia among us."
Diana: "Bob, accusing Charlie so quickly feels risky. We should gather more info before voting to avoid a mistake."
You: "Trusting me on this is our best chance. I investigated Charlie last night—he's the mafia. If we hesitate, we risk losing Diana next."

Charlie: "I still have no new information to share, but I do agree with Diana that we need to gather more evidence before making any hasty decisions. Let's focus on investigating each other and work together as a team to uncover the truth."

Diana: "Bob claiming to have investigated Charlie is suspicious, since only the detective can investigate and we know there's only one detective. If Bob is the detective, why hasn't he shared any proof or details? We need to be cautious."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
